explanation: [0-0] On a quiet residential street, a man stands in the distance, bat in hand, ready to hit. He wears yellow shorts and is bare-chested, facing away from the camera. In front of the camera, a pair of hands holds a black device with a yellow baseball resting on it. The street is lined with buildings of various sizes and some greenery, with a gray car parked on the left side.
[0-4] The hands activate the device, launching the ball swiftly towards the man. The man swings the bat, successfully striking the ball, which rebounds quickly.
